author: timbeiko
content:
Draft for a "request for editors": https://notes.ethereum.org/@timbeiko/eip-editors

Feedback welcome. Also, where should we send potential candidates?

author: timbeiko
content: I'm kind of wondering if instead of telling people to "apply" we could point them towards 1-2 easy tasks to prove they are interested, this way we don't create a ton of additional work for Micah + lightclient to answer questions for interested folks.

author: timbeiko
content: Also, on another note, what is the next step for the eth63+64 EIPs?

author: gcolvin
content: I left some comments on a discussion of EIP quality and link inclusion at https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3717 even though it is already merged.  I only noticed it today, and without that context my comments might not make much sense.
